content.html: Back on the @Nigella_Lawson train: tonight, the glorious no-churn coffee ice cream, but with Baileys instead of coffee liqueur, and stuffed in a croissant sandwich (no brioche buns in Helsinki, sadly!) with dark chocolate cream. Nigella, we love you and thank you.ğŸ™ğŸ¾ğŸ˜
